      • isThere

        public static boolean isThere(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.util.Set<java.lang.String>>>> lib,
                              java.lang.String shelf,
                              java.lang.String corridor,
                              java.lang.String writer,
                              java.lang.String book,
                              java.util.Scanner sc1)
        This method checks is there searched book or another book.
        Parameters:
        lib - Library Map
        shelf - Searched book's shelf number
        corridor - Searched book's corridor number
        writer - Searched book's writer name
        book - Searched book's name
        sc1 - Scanner
        Returns:
        True if the location is right else return false
